Package game.behaviour

Class GoToLocation

java.lang.Object
game.behaviour.MovingBehaviour
game.behaviour.GoToLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class GoToLocation
extends MovingBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a Location with target Growable/Item, or does something when the actor reaches the Location
Since:
16/05/2021
Version:
1.1
Author:
Lin Chen Xiang, NgYuKang
See Also:
Behaviour, Actor, Growable, Item, Action, GameMap, Location

      public GoToLocation​(Location there, Growable growable, Action action)
      Constructor that takes in Growable
      Parameters:
      there - the Location of the Growable
      growable - the Growable to be reached
      action - the Action to be done when reaching there

  • Method Details

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Decides the current Action for this Actor
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      map - the GameMap containing the Actor
      Returns:
      MoveActorAction if Actor has not reached target, or action if Actor reached target
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)
